content: *nell is a crocheted yoke with straps that we have stitched to coordinating fabric creating a fabulous babydoll top berroco * skill level intermediate finished measurements bust 32 34-36-38-40 length of yoke 5 not including straps note yoke should fit snugly around bust materials berroco naturlin 50 grs 2 2-3-3-3 hanks #6332 denim crochet hook size 3 50 mm e or size to obtain gauge 2 pieces of fabric 45 wide x desired length schematics are provided
